00049 // Forward-declare the class.

00051 class KDTree;

00071 template <typename T, const unsigned int D, typename S = KVector<VectorDistance<T>, VectorDistance<T> > >
00072 class KDTree {
00073 public:
00075   static unsigned const int Dimensions = D;
00076 
00078   typedef Vector<T, D> Point;
00079 
00081   typedef VectorDistance<T> Neighbour;
00082 
00083   // Constructors and destructors.
00084   KDTree(); 
00085   ~KDTree(); 
00086 
00087   // Basic kd-tree operations.
00088   bool build(const DataSet<T, D>& train_set, unsigned int bucket_size = 32); 
00089   void knn(const Point &p, unsigned int K, std::vector<Neighbour> &output, const T &epsilon = Traits<T>::zero(), bool ignore_p_in_tree = false) const; 
00090   void all_in_range(const Point &p, const T &distance, std::vector<Neighbour> &output, bool ignore_p_in_tree = false) const; 
00091 
00093   const Point &operator [] (unsigned int index) const;
00094 
00095   // Stream operators.
00096   friend std::istream &operator >> <>(std::istream &in, KDTree &kdtree);
00097   friend std::ostream &operator << <>(std::ostream &out, const KDTree &kdtree);
00098 
00099   // Kd-tree properties.
00100   unsigned int size() const { return num_elements; } 
00101 
00102 #ifdef DEBUG_KDTREE
00103   bool verify() const;
00104 #endif
00105 
00106 protected:
00108   struct SearchData {
00109 
00110     const Point &p; 
00111     const Point *data; 
00112     unsigned int K; 
00113 
00114     T hyperrect_distance; 
00115     T farthest_distance; 
00116     bool ignore_null_distances;  
00117 
00119     struct AxisData {
00120       T p; 
00121       T nearest; 
00122     } axis[D]; 
00123 
00125     SearchData(const Point &p, const Point *data, unsigned int K, bool ignore_p_in_tree);
00126   };
00127 
00129   struct Leaf {
00130     unsigned int first_index; 
00131     unsigned int num_elements; 
00132 
00134     Leaf(unsigned int first_index, unsigned int num_elements) :
00135       first_index(first_index), num_elements(num_elements) {}
00136 
00138     Leaf(std::istream &input);
00139 
00141     template <typename C> void explore(SearchData &data, C &candidates) const;
00142 
00144     template <typename C> void intersect(SearchData &data, C &candidates) const;
00145     template <typename C> void intersect_ignoring_same(SearchData &data, C &candidates) const;
00146 
00148     bool write_to_binary_stream(std::ostream &out);
00149 
00150 #ifdef DEBUG_KDTREE
00151     template <typename Op>
00152     bool verify_op(const Point* data, float value, int axis, const Op &op) const;
00153 #endif
00154   };
00155 
00157   struct Node {
00158 
00159     union {
00160       Node *left_branch; 
00161       Leaf *left_leaf; 
00162     };
00163 
00164     union {
00165       Node *right_branch; 
00166       Leaf *right_leaf; 
00167     };
00168 
00169     T split_value; 
00170 
00171     // The leaf flags use the two uppermost bits of the axis index. Won't handle more than 2^30 dimensions.
00172     union {
00173       unsigned int axis; 
00174       unsigned int is_leaf; 
00175     };
00176 
00177     // Bit masks to access the leaf and axis information.
00178     static const unsigned int left_bit  = 0x80000000U; 
00179     static const unsigned int right_bit = 0x40000000U; 
00180     static const unsigned int axis_mask = 0x3FFFFFFFU; 
00181 
00182     // Constructors and destructor.
00183     Node() : left_branch(NULL), right_branch(NULL), is_leaf(0) {} 
00184     Node(std::istream &input); 
00185     ~Node(); 
00186 
00187 #ifdef DEBUG_KDTREE
00188     bool verify(const Point* data, int axis) const;
00189 
00190     template <typename Op>
00191     bool verify_op(const Point* data, float value, int axis, const Op &op) const;
00192 #endif
00193 
00195     struct AxisComparer {
00196       const Point *data; 
00197       unsigned int axis; 
00198 
00200       bool operator () (const unsigned int &i1, const unsigned int &i2) const {
00201         return data[i1][axis] < data[i2][axis];
00202       }
00203     };
00204 
00205     // --- Training-related --- //
00206 
00208     static Node *build(const Point *data, unsigned int *index, unsigned int n,
00209         Node *parent, unsigned int bucket_size, unsigned int &processed);
00210 
00212     unsigned int split(unsigned int *index, unsigned int n, const AxisComparer &comparer);
00213 
00214     // --- Search-related --- //
00215 
00217     template <typename C> void explore(const Node *parent, SearchData &data, C &candidates) const;
00218 
00220     template <typename C> void intersect(const Node *parent, SearchData &data, C &candidates) const;
00221 
00222     // --- IO-related --- //
00223 
00225     bool write_to_binary_stream(std::ostream &out);
00226   };

00230   public:
